name: Don't Go Chasing Waterfalls Quiz | Physical Geography | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
James Angel.

	Angel Falls, on the River Churun in Venezuela is the highest uninterrupted cataract in the world. It drops some 3,212 feet from the Mesa of Auyan Tepuy. It was discovered in 1935, by the American aviator, James C. Angel.

David Livingstone.

	David Livingstone became the first European to visit the falls in 1855 and gave them the name of the English monarch.

South Africa.

	Tugela Falls is a series of falls on the Tugela River in Natal Province, South Africa. At over 3,000 feet in height, it is second only to Angel Falls.

questions.text: What is the highest waterfall in the United States?
questions.explanation:
Olo'upena Falls.

	Olo'upena Falls is located on Molokai Island, Hawaii.

questions.text: Half of the ten highest waterfalls in the world are located in Norway.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Five of the ten highest water falls in the world are in Norway.

questions.text: Where in the world are the Montezuma Falls?
questions.explanation:
Tasmania.

	Montezuma Falls are located near the town of Rosebery, on the west coast of Tasmania.

questions.text: What happened at Niagara Falls on March 29-30 1848?
options: A human went over the falls in a barrel and survived, for the first time
A daredevil crossed the falls on a tightrope with his manager on his back
A daredevil crossed the falls on a tightrope
questions.explanation:
They dried up.

	The flow of water over the falls completely stopped due to an ice jam upriver.

questions.text: Why is the Godafoss- The Gods Waterfall - in Iceland, so called?
questions.correct: Because the statues of viking gods were thrown into them when Iceland converted to Christianity
options: Because the sound of the falls reminds the locals of Thor- the Norse god of thunder
They are named after their discoverer, Godsen Godsunn
questions.explanation:
Because the statues of viking gods were thrown into them when Iceland converted to Christianity.

	The Godafoss Waterfalls are located in North Central Iceland.

questions.text: Where are the Boiling Pots Waterfalls?
questions.explanation:
Hilo, Hawaii.

	The Boiling Pots are situated on the Wailuku River.

questions.text: Which of these waterfalls is NOT in the United States?
questions.explanation:
Crescent Falls.

	Crescent Falls are located in Canada, in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains.
